mapper.select: select departmet.did, departmet.dname, count(course.cid) as course_num, sum(cls.capacity) as capacity, sum(cls.chose_num) as chose_num from departmet left join (course join cls) on cls.cid = course.cid and course.did = departmet.did group by departmet.did

select cls.cid, course.cname as name, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour, count(course.cid) as class_num from cls join course join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and course.did = departmet.did group by course.cid limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{n,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select course.cid, course.cname as name, course.credit, course.hour,
cls.clsid as class_id, cls.term, cls.capacity, cls.chose_num, teacher.tname as teacher,
avg(stu_cls.usual_grade) as avg_usual_grade, avg(stu_cls.usual_grade) as avg_final_grade from cls join course join teacher join departmet join stu_cls on cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and course.did = departmet.did and stu_cls.clsid = cls.clsid where departmet.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by stu_cls.clsid
